language.set_success: ✅ You have successfully set the language for this server to '{{selectedLanguage}}'
language.set_fail: ❌ Failed to change this server's language: {{error}}

history.steam_auth_required_description:
Your Steam account is linked but not authenticated due to being connected using an outdated method.

This method will soon be deprecated. To ensure continued access to the `me` shortcut and related features, please re-link your account using the `/store` command.

Thank you for your understanding!

match.steam_auth_required_description:
Your Steam account is linked but not authenticated due to being connected using an outdated method.

This method will soon be deprecated. To ensure continued access to the `me` shortcut and related features, please re-link your account using the `/store` command.

Thank you for your understanding!

store.success: You have successfully linked your Steam account: {{name}} ({{id}})
store.title: 🔗 Steam Account Authentication
store.description:
To enable the `me` shortcut in certain commands, we require you to authenticate your Steam account.

We only retain your **SteamID64**, which is used solely for account association within our system. No additional data is accessed or stored, and the authentication process does not grant us any control over your Steam account.

For more information, please review our [Privacy Policy](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1AwofbGUpWC0pmRcok1N99hja5_-lzzKOVWf0cmO1kb0/edit?usp=sharing).

warnings.cooldown: ❌ Please wait another `{{time}}` seconds to run this command!
warnings.no_permission: ❌ You don't have permission to use this command!
